node.statement: VERIFICATION OF EQUALITY: We verify 1/Phi_2(r) = 1/Phi_2(p) + 1/Phi_2(q). LHS: 1/Phi_2(r) = 1/(2/((a-b)^2+(c-d)^2)) = ((a-b)^2+(c-d)^2)/2. RHS: 1/Phi_2(p) + 1/Phi_2(q) = (a-b)^2/2 + (c-d)^2/2 = ((a-b)^2+(c-d)^2)/2. Therefore LHS = RHS, and the superadditivity inequality 1/Phi_2(r) >= 1/Phi_2(p) + 1/Phi_2(q) holds with EXACT EQUALITY for n=2. QED.
